title: Qatar asks Hamas officials to leave country following pressure from US: Report
content: The US has urged Qatar to expel Hamas leaders. This follows Hamas's rejection of ceasefire and hostage exchange proposals. Qatar has asked Hamas leaders to leave. Qatar has hosted Hamas leaders since 2012 as part of a negotiation agreement. The US has expressed impatience with Qatar's ties to Hamas. Hamas officials deny receiving a formal request to leave Qatar.
summary: The US has urged Qatar to expel Hamas leaders. This follows Hamas's rejection of ceasefire and hostage exchange proposals. Qatar has asked Hamas leaders to leave. Qatar has hosted Hamas leaders since 2012 as part of a negotiation agreement. The US has expressed impatience with Qatar's ties to Hamas. Hamas officials deny receiving a formal request to leave Qatar.

title: 'Our relationship with India is much expanded': US defense secretary Lloyd Austin reflects on his 4-year tenure
content: US defense secretary Lloyd Austin emphasized the strengthening of global security alliances, particularly highlighting the growth of the US-India partnership. He acknowledged the Pentagon's focus on various regions, including the Indo-Pacific, while reaffirming support for Ukraine and addressing humanitarian concerns in Gaza.
summary: US defense secretary Lloyd Austin emphasized the strengthening of global security alliances, particularly highlighting the growth of the US-India partnership. He acknowledged the Pentagon's focus on various regions, including the Indo-Pacific, while reaffirming support for Ukraine and addressing humanitarian concerns in Gaza.

title: Parked vehicle with gas cylinders explodes on NYC street, damaging homes and cars, officials say
content: An SUV explosion in Queens, New York City, caused significant damage to nearby homes and vehicles. The explosion, captured on camera, was caused by the failure of a pressurized cylinder inside the vehicle, which was being used for construction and contained flammable materials. Thankfully, no injuries were reported.
summary: An SUV explosion in Queens, New York City, caused significant damage to nearby homes and vehicles. The explosion, captured on camera, was caused by the failure of a pressurized cylinder inside the vehicle, which was being used for construction and contained flammable materials. Thankfully, no injuries were reported.

title: US police arrest suspect in series of stabbings in Seattle
content: A man was arrested in downtown Seattle on Friday for allegedly stabbing five people. Police suspect he may also be responsible for five other stabbings in the same area since Thursday morning. The victims appear to have been targeted at random, with injuries ranging from minor cuts to serious stab wounds.
summary: A man was arrested in downtown Seattle on Friday for allegedly stabbing five people. Police suspect he may also be responsible for five other stabbings in the same area since Thursday morning. The victims appear to have been targeted at random, with injuries ranging from minor cuts to serious stab wounds.

title: 'The Handmaid's Tale' sales go up too...
Fear of 'Trump's America' fuels search for haven abroad
content: Following election results suggesting a second term for Donald Trump, online searches by Americans about emigrating to countries like Canada, New Zealand, and Australia saw a massive surge. This mirrors similar trends observed after the 2016 election, reflecting concerns among some Americans about the future of the country and its political climate.
summary: Following election results suggesting a second term for Donald Trump, online searches by Americans about emigrating to countries like Canada, New Zealand, and Australia saw a massive surge.  This mirrors similar trends observed after the 2016 election, reflecting concerns among some Americans about the future of the country and its political climate.

title: Trudeau panel on US ties to prep for Don's dawn
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has reinstated a special cabinet committee to address concerns about a second Donald Trump presidency. The committee, chaired by Deputy PM Chrystia Freeland, will focus on crucial Canada-US issues, particularly in light of potential trade tensions. Canadian police are also preparing for a possible influx of asylum-seekers fleeing the US following Trump's victory.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has reinstated a special cabinet committee to address concerns about a second Donald Trump presidency. The committee, chaired by Deputy PM Chrystia Freeland, will focus on crucial Canada-US issues, particularly in light of potential trade tensions.  Canadian police are also preparing for a possible influx of asylum-seekers fleeing the US following Trump's victory.

title: Israeli soccer fans in Amsterdam attacked by 'hit-&-run squads'
content: Amsterdam banned demonstrations and granted police emergency powers after antisemitic attacks on Israeli soccer fans. Youths on scooters targeted and assaulted fans throughout the city, leading to hospitalizations and numerous arrests. Israeli authorities are flying citizens back home amidst safety concerns and rising tensions.
summary: Amsterdam banned demonstrations and granted police emergency powers after antisemitic attacks on Israeli soccer fans. Youths on scooters targeted and assaulted fans throughout the city, leading to hospitalizations and numerous arrests.  Israeli authorities are flying citizens back home amidst safety concerns and rising tensions.

title: Republicans widen Senate majority; House in balance
content: Republicans are nearing a narrow victory in the US House of Representatives, with control hanging on the outcome of a handful of remaining races. While Democrats flipped two New York seats, Republicans are projected to secure a Senate majority, bolstering Trump's agenda. However, a potential slim House majority could limit Trump's legislative ambitions.
summary: Republicans are nearing a narrow victory in the US House of Representatives, with control hanging on the outcome of a handful of remaining races. While Democrats flipped two New York seats, Republicans are projected to secure a Senate majority, bolstering Trump's agenda. However, a potential slim House majority could limit Trump's legislative ambitions.

title: Putin praises Trump, says Russia ready for dialogue; prez-elect hints they will speak
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory and commended his courage during a past assassination attempt. Putin expressed a willingness to resume dialogue with the Trump administration, acknowledging Trump's campaign remarks on Ukraine and US-Russia relations. However, Putin's spokesman clarified that Russia's stance on Ukraine remains unchanged.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory and commended his courage during a past assassination attempt. Putin expressed a willingness to resume dialogue with the Trump administration, acknowledging Trump's campaign remarks on Ukraine and US-Russia relations. However, Putin's spokesman clarified that Russia's stance on Ukraine remains unchanged.

title: Trump put Musk on phone with Zelensky during call
content: During a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, former US President Donald Trump surprised many by handing the phone to Elon Musk. The nature of their conversation remains unclear, but sources suggest it was positive. This event raises questions about potential shifts in US-Ukraine relations under Trump's leadership, especially given his promise to swiftly end the conflict and Musk's significant support for Ukraine's war efforts through Starlink.
summary: During a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, former US President Donald Trump surprised many by handing the phone to Elon Musk. The nature of their conversation remains unclear, but sources suggest it was positive. This event raises questions about potential shifts in US-Ukraine relations under Trump's leadership, especially given his promise to swiftly end the conflict and Musk's significant support for Ukraine's war efforts through Starlink.

title: 'She just walked away from me': Red-district Dem's awkward meeting with Kamala Harris
content: Democrat Marie Gluesenkamp Perez, representative for Washington's 3rd district, recounted an awkward encounter with Vice President Kamala Harris at a Christmas party. She said she noticed that all garlands in the party were plastic. “I was strong-armed into taking a picture. I said, ‘Madam Vice President, we grow those where I live,'” Gluesenkamp told her but she didn't pay any attention.
summary: Democrat Marie Gluesenkamp Perez, representative for Washington's 3rd district, recounted an awkward encounter with Vice President Kamala Harris at a Christmas party. She said she noticed that all garlands in the party were plastic. “I was strong-armed into taking a picture. I said, ‘Madam Vice President, we grow those where I live,'” Gluesenkamp told her but she didn't pay any attention.

title: Donald Trump handed phone to Elon Musk during call with Zelensky: Reports
content: Zeelensky called Trump to congratulate him on the election win and Trump, according to the reports, "did not leave Zelensky with a feeling of despair". "Musk also weighed in during the call to say he will continue supporting Ukraine through his Starlink," reports said. Donald Trump's chat with Zelensky was also positive, the reports said.
summary: Zeelensky called Trump to congratulate him on the election win and Trump, according to the reports, "did not leave Zelensky with a feeling of despair". "Musk also weighed in during the call to say he will continue supporting Ukraine through his Starlink," reports said. Donald Trump's chat with Zelensky was also positive, the reports said.

title: Israeli football fans clash with protesters in Amsterdam
Pakistan says it can serve as bridge between US and China
content: Pakistan has stated its intention to mediate between the United States and China amidst escalating global tensions. Despite close military ties with the US, Pakistan's economy relies heavily on China, prompting a neutral stance in the face of US-China rivalry. Islamabad emphasized its enduring strategic partnership with China, unaffected by US political shifts, while also expressing a commitment to strengthening its long-standing relationship with the US.
summary: Pakistan has stated its intention to mediate between the United States and China amidst escalating global tensions. Despite close military ties with the US, Pakistan's economy relies heavily on China, prompting a neutral stance in the face of US-China rivalry. Islamabad emphasized its enduring strategic partnership with China, unaffected by US political shifts, while also expressing a commitment to strengthening its long-standing relationship with the US.

title: Who is Robert Lighthizer whom Trump has asked to be US trade chief?
content: Donald Trump has reportedly asked Robert Lighthizer to rejoin his administration as US Trade Representative. Lighthizer, known for his protectionist stance and alignment with Trump's trade policies, previously served in the same role during Trump's first term. His potential return will signal a renewed focus on aggressive trade tactics, including tariffs on imports.
summary: Donald Trump has reportedly asked Robert Lighthizer to rejoin his administration as US Trade Representative. Lighthizer, known for his protectionist stance and alignment with Trump's trade policies, previously served in the same role during Trump's first term. His potential return will signal a renewed focus on aggressive trade tactics, including tariffs on imports.

title: Elon Musk calls Kimmel 'insufferable'; Jimmy replies, 'At least my children like me'
content: "At least my children like me," Kimmel gave Elon Musk back referring to Musk's estranged daughter 20-year-old Vivian Wilson who publicly severed ties with her father and left not chance to berate him -- the election being the one as Wilson announced that she sees no future in Trump's US.
summary: "At least my children like me," Kimmel gave Elon Musk back referring to Musk's estranged daughter 20-year-old Vivian Wilson who publicly severed ties with her father and left not chance to berate him -- the election being the one as Wilson announced that she sees no future in Trump's US.

title: 'Everywhere you looked was sex': Diddy once decorated Freak Off room with hundreds of mirrors
content: Money was not a problem, the planner said divulging that the room was where Diddy hosted many high-profile parties that turned into orgies after certain hours at night. The cost per party was $500,000. "This is for both the mainstream part and the sex party afterwards," the planner said. On the specific mirror decoration, the planner recalled that those mirrors were then taken off and the room went back to its original state and that decoration was only for the party.
summary: Money was not a problem, the planner said divulging that the room was where Diddy hosted many high-profile parties that turned into orgies after certain hours at night. The cost per party was $500,000. "This is for both the mainstream part and the sex party afterwards," the planner said. On the specific mirror decoration, the planner recalled that those mirrors were then taken off and the room went back to its original state and that decoration was only for the party.

title: Ted Cruz's daughter viral for her 'eww-like' expression on Donald Trump: 'Don't clap'
content: ​"I hope and pray Donald Trump will be re-elected as the president of the United States," Ted Cruz said to the cheers of the audience and her wife was also clapping when their daughter Caroline made a disgusting expression and told her mother to not clap for that. In 2016 when Ted Cruz ran for president election before endorsing Trump, Trump called his wife ugly and asked whether Cruz can be US president because he was born in Canada.

In 2016 when Ted Cruz ran for president election before endorsing Trump, Trump called his wife ugly and asked whether Cruz can be US president because he was born in Canada.

title: Tim Walz's daughter melts down on TikTok: 'This country does not deserve Kamala Harris'
content: Coming to President-elect Donald Trump and Vice-President-elect JD Vance, Hope said those two will have to live in their own skin and that's a punishment that she would never wish upon anybody except for them. “These people have to live in their own skin, as in JD Vance and Donald Trump have to be JD Vance and Donald Trump and that is not a punishment I’d wish upon anybody but those two individuals,” the 23-year-old said.
